title: Does my phone support drawing letters when the screen is off to open applications?
answer:
When the screen is off, drawing letters can help you quickly open applications. Your phone supports using up to 4 letters to open applications.

Go to **Settings** > **Motion control** > **Draw**. Touch either the slide or draw letters preset options. Choose the application you would like to open. After checking the slide or draw letters check box, you can quickly open the applications by swiping on the screen or drawing the letter that corresponds to the application when the screen is off.
